start: ^Hey girl! How are you? I'm gonna get my usual today.
^I'm well! One iced americano with cream, coming right up.
^...remind me of your order one more time?

c-1: ^Oh, sorry-- it's an iced americano with cream.
g-0: ^I finally have a tracklist for my album! Now it's time for me to start recording my songs.
^Do you have any band members or will it just be solo? Either way I'm so exciting to hear it!
^That's exciting, what are you gonna do about getting a band?

c-2: ^I haven't thought about it yet, do you know any good musicians? Aside from me of course, haha.

g-1: ^It's been a few years... but I still have my old guitar I used to play in high school. Since moving here I've really been too busy to play much-- I'm pretty rusty.
^I don't play any very well at least.
g-2: ^Well, I don't have a lot of connections with other musicians in the area, so if you know anyone who'd be interested in playing with me let me know!
^Honestly, I'd be down to play some background guitar for you, only if you need it...
^I'll let you know if any musicians come into the cafe.

c-6: ^That would be awesome!! Let's try to hang out sometime to practice.

g-3: ^Thanks again for the coffee and conversation. Stopping by your cafe is one of the highlights of my day.
^Thank you for coming in! I'm so glad that you enjoy stopping by my cafe, it's comforting to have some regular customers!
